name: CYDR FOUNDATION
briefDescription: CYDR Foundation is working for provide education to poor children in urban and rural areas especially girl child, welfare program for physically disabled persons/youth, women empowerment, save water/environment/pollution , free legal advocacy etc. Currently 730 people are directly benefited by us in short- 20 girls are taking computer education at our center free of cost, about 100 families(approx 350 peoples) of farmers are benefited by cloth/blanket,about 260 students are aware about to importance of Indian Constitution an contribution of freedom fighters and 100 volunteers are working all over india and getting stipend by us
